text: Given your preparation for teaching how comfortable are you teaching at the grade-level you have been assigned?

answers: Two or three times a month

text: This year, how often have you had conversations with your colleagues about what helps students learn?
answers: Two or three times a month

text: As a faculty, how well do you do talking through views, opinions, and values?

How interesting do you find the things you learn in school?

See myself as a learner a little bit

text: How much does your .* teacher encourage you to do your best?

How much do you think that being good at math is something you can change?
How much do you think that needing to try really hard in a subject at school means you can’t be good at it?
